intro: In this visual novel, Mogli, a curious and brave young man, finds himself stranded on a mysterious island after an unexpected storm.
description:
Together with his new friends, a wise turtle, a resourceful parrot, a mischievous monkey and a loyal dolphin, Mogli must join forces to unravel the island's secrets and restore peace. Through his journey, he will learn the value of friendship, courage and the power to protect his new home.

·A new Mogil story: Join Mogil on his exciting new adventure!

·Lots of new characters: Discover new friends full of personality.

·Colorful backgrounds: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world with vibrant settings.

·Lovely music: Enjoy a soundtrack that the whole family will love.

·Immersive story: A story that captivates children and encourages positive values.

·Over an hour of fun: Educational entertainment for little ones!
